warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    float1 d = 0.001;
warp_5=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(d,0)) ).y*1280*texsize.z;
warp_6=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,d)) ).y*1024*texsize.w;
warp_7=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.001 + texsize.zw*float2(0,0)* tex2D( sampler_pc_main, uv).y;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`
warp_10=`
warp_11=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_pc_main, my_uv).y;
warp_12=`    ret.y += (ret.y - GetBlur1(uv).y - 0.1)*.6 +0.27;
warp_13=`//ret = 0;
warp_14=`
warp_15=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret = lerp( float3(.97,.97,1), 0, tex2D(sampler_fw_main, uv).y);
comp_4=`}
